revised_title: Fast-Neutron Breeder Fission Reactor: Economic and Technical Considerations
tldr: This article discusses the economic and technical aspects of fast-neutron breeder fission reactors. The authors debate the feasibility of small reactors competing with large ones, the advantages and disadvantages of different reactor designs, and the importance of keeping fast reactor fuel cycle costs low. They also touch upon issues such as metal fuel development, actinide incineration, and molten fuel-coolant interactions.
